It is with great pleasure that I officially announce the publication of my book **Visualização de Dados com o R**. The content of the book is an extension of chapter 10 of [afedR](https://www.msperlin.com/afedR/). The book is written in portuguese and available at Amazon and online:

- [ebook](https://www.amazon.com.br/dp/B0BK2V4HTB)
- [paperback](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BJYJQ92Q) 
- [hardcover](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BJYMHWLN) 
- [Online version (chapters 01-03)](https://www.msperlin.com/vdr/)

You can find more details in its own [blog page](https://www.msperlin.com/blog/publication/2022_book-vdr/).
